comments.body: Do you need to `displayException raw` here too?
Nope! It's a string. It's a little confusing but these are the return types of the errors we get from Data.Yaml...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +82,86 @@                    ("sdk-version field is invalid in " <> projectConfigName)
                    [("path", unwrapProjectPath projectPath </> projectConfigName)
                    ,("internal", raw)]

-- | Get the list of installed SDK versions. Returned list is
